content.rendered:
(*8*)

Size Name:30cm | Colour Name:WHITE

Perfect Length ( 1 foot / 30cm / 0.3m )

  • 10cm brief size USB to Lightning cable is ideal for your Power Bank and (*11*) Stations.
  • (*12*) measurement and Handy, simpler to be put into baggage or pockets, keep organized, save house, and do away with knots and tangles.

(*5*) Devices ((*7*)):

iPhone 12 12Pro,iPhone 11 11Pro Pro Max, iPhone Xs Max Xs X, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5, iPad Air / Air 2, iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3, iPod nano (seventh technology), and iPod contact (fifth technology)

Tips for Safety Usage:

  1. Use the unique charger or suitable PC to use with the cable and cost your cellphone.
  2. Make certain to use the product in dry locations, keep away from excessive temperatures and open flames.
  3. When the cable is broken, particularly when the jacket is broken and the wire is uncovered, please discard it. Do not cost with it any extra!
  4. When the connector comes into contact with mud, water and different simply conductive objects, it’s finest to substitute it with a brand new one.
  5. Do not use present over 3 Ampere of present on this cable.

✅ PORTABLE LENGTH: 30cm lengthy for charging your cellphone with energy financial institution or energy station; anti-tangling, simple to carry. This USB to Lightning cable can bear 10000+ bending check, and extra sturdy.
✅ 2.4A FAST CHARING: High-quality Tinned copper wire maximizes quick and steady charging. Built-in Apple authentic chipset ensures security for iPhone gadgets. We have made 1000’s of checks to guarantee 100% security.
✅ HIGH SPEED DATA SYNC: Comply with USB 2.0 commonplace, helps information transmission pace up to 480Mbps(60M/s).
✅ WIDE COMPATIBILITY: Suit for the gadgets with Lightning Port, iPhone 12/ 12 Pro Max 11/ 11 Pro Max X XS Max XR / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6s Plus / 6s / 6 Plus / 6 / SE / 5s / 5c / 5 / iPad Pro / iPad Air / iPad mini / iPod Touch fifth gen and newer.
❤ WHAT YOU GET: 5 x 1 foot USB A to Lightning cable, with our 12-month product alternative guarantee and lifelong 7*24h pleasant technical help.
